General.Name: Shivam Autotech Limited
General.Description: Shivam Autotech Limited manufactures and sells auto transmission components primarily for original equipment manufacturers in India and internationally. It provides transmission gears and shafts; spline shafts; plungers; and power train, alternator, starter motor, tractor, e-rickshaw, EPS, magneto, and steering components, as well as various precision engineering components and aluminium forging parts. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India. Shivam Autotech Limited is a subsidiary of Dayanand Munjal Investments Private Limited.
General.Address: Tower A, Emaar Digital Greens, Gurugram, India, 122102
